question.body: What is a functional significance of the anatomical blood supply to the adrenal gland?

part.explanation: This ensures quick release and distribution of these hormones to all parts of the body, especially those related to emergency or stress reactions (cortisol, epinephrine, and norepinephrine).

question.body: What is the functional significance that this is the only endocrine gland with autonomic nervous system innervation?

part.explanation: At the same time the preganglionic sympathetic neurons are stimulating postganglionic neurons to release epinephrine at the effector organs, the adrenal gland is releasing even more epinephrine into the blood to enhance the effects to survive the emergency.
